channel.title: How to remove the code to get item drop on. [317]
channel.description: I downloaded a source and it came with this code that i want to remove but i cant find. Now when you pk anywhere in the wild when you die you dont lose items no matter where you pk. If anyone knows how to remove this could you post here please.

item.title: How to remove the code to get item drop on. [317]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“reapagescapeftw, post:2, topic:269204”]oh yh i think this is right put it on player death
im not sure bout this but might work worth a try

removeAllItems(); teleportToX = DEATHCORDS1; teleportToY = DEATHCORDS2; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/quote]

Ok Thank you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2009, 01:33:38 am[/size][hr]Where should i put this code though?

Read full topic

item.description:
@reapagescapeftw1 wrote:

oh yh i think this is right put it on player death
im not sure bout this but might work worth a try

removeAllItems(); teleportToX = DEATHCORDS1; teleportToY = DEATHCORDS2; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
